entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
